head.supplied: [Mueller recently wrote to me from the interior, saying that he had climbed the high Mount Wellington in November and found many beautiful things.]...

div.p:
Letter notseen. The text givenhere isfrom Tkach, Neubauer & Roser (2022), Brief 20, W. Sonder to D. von Schlechtendal., 8 March 1855. The letter is mostly concerned with thearrangements for publishing the series'Plantae Muellerianae'in Schlechtendal's journal Linnaea,iand enclosingthe MS for Bentham (1853), actually publishedinMay 1855 (TL2).Sonder also wrote 'ich möchte für Dr. Müller noch einiges kaufen, namentlich wäre es mir lieb, den Labillardière (Plant. Nov. Hollandiae) zu erstehen' [Iwould like to buy a few more things for Dr Müller, in particular I would like to purchase the Labillardière (Plant. Nov. Hollandiae)] (i.e. Labillardière (1804-1806).
Sonder also reported that 'Zwei kleine Kisten mit Pflanzen u dergl.
ist schon wieder in England angekommen, mit dem ersten Schiffe erwarte ich sie, dabei sind auch Rapporte
über Müller’s letzte Reisen' [Two small boxes with plants and the like have already arrived again in England, I expect them with the first ship, with them are also reports on Mueller's last journeys].
M's letter is dated to December 1854 by comparison with letters written from Omeothatconveythe same information:M to W. Haines,16 December 1854 and M to W. Hooker,16 December 1854 (in this edition as 54-12-16a). The letter to Hooker discusses some of the plants found. [Müller hat mir neulich aus dem Innern geschrieben, er hatte im Novbr. den hohen Mount Wellington bestiegen und manches Schöne gefunden.]
[Mueller recently wrote to me from the interior, saying that he had climbed the high Mount Wellington in November and found many beautiful things.]
